p: In this study, diabetic rats treated with the A. conyzoides markedly alleviate the oxidative damage by ALX induced in rats. It was observed that the administration of A. conyzoides upturned the enhanced lipid peroxidation and the consequent decline in the level of enzymatic antioxidant (GPx, SOD, and CAT) as well as the activities of nonenzymatic antioxidant (MDA) in the cardiac tissue of diabetic rats. Our finding is in accordance with the reports of [ 6, 28, 49, 50].
